title: Revoke Template
description: Revokes a Role's membership to another Role

member_resource_type.title: Member Resource Type
member_resource_type.description: The member type (group, host, user, or layer) for the revoke

member_resource_id.title: Member Resource Identifier
member_resource_id.description: The member resource identifier for the revoke

role_resource_type.title: Role Resource Type
role_resource_type.description: The role type (group or layer) for the revoke

role_resource_id.title: Role Resource Identifier
role_resource_id.description: The role resource identifier for the revoke
